Title: Correction: Genome-wide gene-environment analyses of major depressive disorder and reported lifetime traumatic experiences in UK Biobank (Molecular Psychiatry, (2020), 10.1038/s41380-019-0546-6)
Abstract: © 2020, Springer Nature Limited.Following publication of this article, the authors noticed an error in Supplementary Table 1. In the original Supplementary Table 1, one of the criteria for control participants was incorrectly given as ‘Report extensive recent symptoms of depression: less than 14 on summed response (where “not at all” = 1 and “nearly every day” = 4) to recent’. This has now been corrected to: ‘Report extensive recent symptoms of depression: less than 5 on summed response (where “not at all” = 1 and “nearly every day” = 4) to recent’.
